## ColorUtils.removeAlphaFromHex() function

Remove transparency info from the number coded color, makes it compatible with external libs.

 getAlphaFromHex.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function removeAlphaFromHex(hex: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  hex | number | The number encoded color value (representable as 0xRRGGBB or 0xTTRRGGBB in hex). |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

number coded color value representable as 0xRRGGBB in hex.
